org.mockito.listeners

Interface MockitoListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MockCreationListener, VerificationListener

    public interface MockitoListener
    Marker interface for all types of Mockito listeners. For more information, see MockitoFramework.addListener(MockitoListener).
